channel.title: Raminator love
channel.description: To help us get through this difficult time of Raminator's absense, I propose we all quote our favorite posts from him. It wont be the same, but it will almost feel like he is really here. [quote="Raminator"] Here's a free protip, guys:[indent][i]If you don't think a thread is worthwhile, use the [url=https://forums.blackmesasource.com/report.php?p=180536][img]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/images/bms_v1/buttons/report.gif[/img][/url] button to alert the moderators. Don't post abusive and off-topic crap; you're not helping anyone, you're not an internet tough guy, you're not going to teach anyone a lesson. You're being a douche.[/i] [/quote]

item.title: Raminator love
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Raminator quote:

https://images.raminator.net/photos/juggernaut/01.jpg
https://images.raminator.net/photos/juggernaut/02.jpg
https://images.raminator.net/photos/juggernaut/03.jpg
https://images.raminator.net/photos/juggernaut/04.jpg
https://images.raminator.net/photos/juggernaut/05.jpg

CPU: Intel Core i7 975 Extreme
Mobo: EVGA X58 Classified 4-Way SLI
GPU: 4x 1GB EVGA GeForce GTX 285 Classified
RAM: 12GB Corsair Dominator PC3-12800
SSD : 2x 160GB Intel X25-M (RAID0)
HDD : 2x 1000GB Seagate Barracuda ES.2 (RAID1)
BDR: Pioneer BDR-205BK BDR/DVDR/CDR
PSU: 1500W SilverStone ST1500
Case: Lian Li PC-P80B Armorsuit
Monitor: 30" Dell 3008WFP
OS: 64-bit Windows 7 Ultimate

Radiators: 2x Swiftech MCR320-QP Stackable
Radiator: Swiftech MCR320-QP
Pumps/reservoirs: 2x Koolance RP-1000BK
CPU block: Swiftech Apogee XT
Mobo block: EK-FB EVGA Classified 4-Way-SLI
GPU blocks: 4x EK-FC285 GTX Classified
Fittings: 1/2" Koolance
Tubing: 1/2" XSPC
Coolant: Feser One

James “orcone” Martin Quote:

Yeah, I was actually in contact with this :bleep: via SMS and shit. He never was dead and besid…w…what WHAT THE F***!?

IS THAT 4 VIDEO CARDS?

Which is basically the feeling of everyone on the team. Raminator is working on his hardware hardon but you can bet that when he is back in business all hell is gonna break lose. With his awesomeness, you can be a GC/MS analyst and use $500,000 worth of instrumentation to turn water into pure liquid science, create spooky settings for a surface tension map on your mod, ban douchbags and diptwads 3 at a time on the forum, flirt with your girlfriend Summer on your newfangled IPod AND teach Chuck Norris the true meaning of life. Yeah, Raminator made Helen Keller talk. Superman wears Raminator underoos. Jack Bauer went to the Awesome training school of Raminator.

Never do test question him!

Read full topic
